ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Bag of the Tinkerers
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm...I *thought* they held Aqualungs and Rebreathers...which other large sized bags can t hold? And from that assumption I thought they held most anything.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm...I *thought* they held Aqualungs and
Rebreathers...which other "large" sized bags can't
hold? And from that assumption I thought they held
most anything.

Perhaps an Aqualung is an XL while a SBH is a XXL?

I unfortunately don't own a Bag or the Tinkerers
yet...but please let me know if I've been given the
wrong information.

thanks,

--- Russ Gresh <grunk@...> wrote:
>
> the bag of the tinkerers does not hold extra large
> stuff such as a shiny
> brass halberd or the giant polar bear pelt quest
> thing where as the box of
> Abu-kar does
>
> Fixer
> 50 enchanter
> Cazic Thule
>
>
